summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ecommerce store. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend mostly functional with modern vibrant UI. Main issue: order success page not displaying after checkout completion.

ui_bugs.issue: After successful checkout, user is redirected to homepage instead of order success page
Direct navigation to /cart doesn't load cart items properly

integration_issues.issue: Order success page not shown after successful order placement

passed_tests: Product listing displays all 8 products correctly
Add to cart functionality works and updates cart count
Cart navigation and item display works when following proper flow
Backend checkout API processes orders successfully
Admin panel displays correct statistics (3 orders, $999.95 revenue)
Admin navigation works on desktop and mobile
Mobile responsive design with working mobile menu
Modern vibrant UI with orange-pink gradients as requested
All backend APIs working (12/12 tests passed)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix order success page routing issue in checkout flow. After successful checkout, user should see order success page with order details and generated discount code (if applicable) instead of being redirected to homepage.
